participant_1.background:
I never knew my father, but my mother is always there for me.
I like to think about my childhood.
I grew up in a small town where the winters were long and cold.
i am a closet cannibal.
i love helping people.

participant_2.background:
I live in my parent's basement and work a lot, so I usually don't have time for a healthy diet or exercise.
i hate tofu.
I'm looking forward to a career in education and finding ways to incorporate fruit into my child's diet.
I'm not rich, but I enjoy playing fetch with my dogs and drinking Pepsi.
I take to social media to connect with my friends and family for support.

content.text: Hello there! How is your day going?
It is going pretty well! How about yours?
Mine is going well as well!
I grew up in a small town where the winters were long and cold.
That sounds like a nice place to grow up. I live in my parent's basement and work a lot, so I usually don't have time for a healthy diet or exercise.
I am sorry to hear that. I hope you are able to find time for some exercise soon.
Thank you! I am looking forward to a career in education and finding ways to incorporate fruit into my child's diet.
That is great to hear! I am sure you will be a great teacher.
Thank you! I am not rich, but I enjoy playing fetch with my dogs and drinking Pepsi.
That sounds like a great way to relax! I love Pepsi too.
I take to social media to connect with my friends and family for support.
That is a great way to stay connected with your loved ones.
I am glad we are having this conversation. It is nice to meet you!
Me too! It is nice to meet you as well
